entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 6:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
